rrdworld.name: p|r|b php rrd browser
rrdworld.author: Guillaume Fontaine **
rrdworld.description: A modular rrdtool utility for polling and graphing data. It is written in php and stores configuration information in mysql. The aim is to be highly flexible and make it possible to gather most any kind of data and and graph it. The creation of RRA's, the polling logic and the graph definitions are all defined in dedicated php modules which can be added or customized at will. The poller and web font-end both use these modules.
